trans:
Because if I go up on stage with confidence without any thinking, I tend to feel less nervous.
I relax with the mindset that I have to enjoy it!  ğŸ¤©
2, How to relieve stressâ€¦?
Hmmâ€¦ Let me give you the answer I thinkâ€¦!
Above all, as I think that time will heal everything, even if I'm stressed, it seems like I try not to take it too seriously!!
Also, while we get stress and express our joys and sorrows when we live our lives.. I think that is the most important and fun way to live! I think living like that is the most important and fun thing!
Bad things make good things shine even more!!! ğŸŒŸ
Think about it like that!! ğŸ˜†
Lastly! To eat delicious food is another way i!!
Everyone, eat some delicious food, eat some more, sleep, and get rid of your stress!! ğŸœğŸ£ğŸ™ğŸ¤ğŸ‚ğŸ¦ğŸŸğŸ•
